dc_title_s: Geological map of Keweenaw Point, Lake Superior, Michigan; by J. W. Foster & J. D. Whitney; S. W. Hill and W. Schlatter, assistants.
dc_description_s: Relief shown by spot heights and hachures; depths shown by soundings. Shows mineral lands, mines, and furnaces. Appears in: Jackson, Charles T. Report of the geological and mineralogical survey of the mineral lands of the United States in the state of Michigan. Washington, 1849. between p. 624 and 625. 1 map: hand col.; 28 x 56 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Foster, J. W. (John Wells), 1815-1873.,Whitney, J. D. (Josiah Dwight), 1819-1896.,Hill, S. W. (Samuel Worth), 1815-1889.,Schlatter, Wm. (William),P.S. Duval & Co.
